titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C12

body.ab:
<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0065__main__1"/> "Dear,
dear
Elizabeth"
I
exclaimed
<lb n="c56-0065__main__2"/>
when I had read her
letter"–I
will write
<lb n="c56-0065__main__3"/> instantly
and relieve them from the
<lb n="c56-0065__main__4"/> great pain
they must
feel."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0065__main__5"/>
I wrote, and this exertion greatly
<lb n="c56-0065__main__6"/>
fatigued me; but my convalescence
<del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e11885__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e11885__End"/><lb n="c56-0065__left_margin__1"/>had<lb n="c56-0065__main__7"/> commenced
and
<del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e11901__Start"/>went on<del loc="c56-0065__main__d1e11901__End"/>proceeded regularly–in <lb n="c56-0065__main__8"/>
another fortnight I was able to
<lb n="c56-0065__main__9"/>
leave my
chamber. <lb n="c56-0065__main__10"/><metamark function="separate">______</metamark><lb n="c56-0066__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0066.05" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 8th<lb n="c56-0066__main__2"/> one
of my first duties on my recovery was
<lb n="c56-0066__main__3"/>
to introduce Clerval to the
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>several
professors of
<lb n="c56-0066__main__4"/>
the university.
And
in doing
this
I
under <lb n="c56-0066__main__5"/> went <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11950__Start"/>torments<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11950__End"/>
a kind of rough
usage <lb n="c56-0066__main__6"/><del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11954__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11954__End"/>
ill
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11958__Start"/>befitten<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11958__End"/>
befitting the wounds that<lb n="c56-0066__main__7"/> my mind had sustained. Ever since the
<lb n="c56-0066__main__8"/>
fatal
night –
the end of my
labours
&<lb n="c56-0066__main__9"/> the beginning of my
misfortunes <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11977__Start"/>(<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11977__End"/>
I had
<lb n="c56-0066__main__10"/>
conceived a violent antipathy even to
<lb n="c56-0066__main__11"/>
the name of
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11987__Start"/>Chemistry<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e11987__End"/>Natural
Philosophy. When I was other<lb n="c56-0066__main__12"/>wise quite restored to
health
the sight of a<lb n="c56-0066__main__13"/> Chemical instrument
brought on <lb n="c56-0066__main__14"/> againrenewed
all
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the
agony of my
my<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>
nervous
symtoms. <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12030__Start"/>Lo<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12030__End"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__15"/>
Henry saw
this
and had
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12038__Start"/>packed up<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12038__End"/>removed<lb n="c56-0066__main__16"/>
all my
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12049__Start"/>machines<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12049__End"/><del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12052__Start"/>in a chest<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12052__End"/>apparatus
from my
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12057__Start"/>che<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12057__End"/> view
he had also
<lb n="c56-0066__main__17"/>
changed my
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12066__Start"/>room<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12066__End"/>apartment,
for he perceived that
<lb n="c56-0066__main__18"/>
I had acquired
dislike
to
the room which had
<lb n="c56-0066__main__19"/>
previously been my
workshop.
But these
<lb n="c56-0066__main__20"/>
cares of Clerval were
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12088__Start"/>thrown away<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12088__End"/>made
of no avail when
<lb n="c56-0066__main__21"/>
I visited the professors.
even my excellent <lb n="c56-0066__main__22"/>
M. Waldman inflicted torture when
<lb n="c56-0066__main__23"/>
he
praised
with
<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12102__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12102__End"/>
kindness and warmth,
<lb n="c56-0066__main__24"/>
the astonishing progress
that
I had made
<lb n="c56-0066__main__25"/>
in the sciences. He soon perceived <lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/>that I<lb n="c56-0066__main__26"/>
disliked<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12125__Start"/>of<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12125__End"/>
the
subject,
but
not guessing
<lb n="c56-0066__main__27"/>
the real
cause
he attributed <lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/>my feelings<lb n="c56-0066__main__28"/> to
modesty <del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12142__Start"/>on hearing myself praised<del loc="c56-0066__main__d1e12142__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12150__Start"/>he therefore<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12150__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>and
changed the subject from
<lb n="c56-0067__main__2"/>
my
improvement,
to the science itself,
<lb n="c56-0067__main__3"/>
with
<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12163__Start"/>an<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12163__End"/>
a
desire
as I evidently
saw <lb n="c56-0067__main__4"/>
of drawing
<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12169__Start"/>friend<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12169__End"/>
me out.
<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12172__Start"/>K<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12172__End"/>Kind <lb n="c56-0067__main__5"/> friend he tortured me withoutbut <lb n="c56-0067__main__6"/> it<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12188__Start"/>How cruel is<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12188__End"/>
What could I do?
<lb n="c56-0067__main__7"/>
He meant to
please <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12193__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12193__End"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12197__Start"/>me<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12197__End"/>&
he
<lb n="c56-0067__main__8"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12203__Start"/>tortured<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12203__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>tormented me <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12216__Start"/>it was<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12216__End"/>I
felt as if he
<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12223__Start"/>had<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12223__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__9"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>placed carefully
one by
one <del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12235__Start"/>placed<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12235__End"/>
in my
<lb n="c56-0067__main__10"/>
view those instruments which were <lb n="c56-0067__main__11"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>to be afterwards used in putting me to a
<lb n="c56-0067__main__12"/>
slow and cruel
<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12251__Start"/>dre<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12251__End"/>
death. I writhed
<lb n="c56-0067__main__13"/>
under his words, yet dared not
shew <lb n="c56-0067__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12257__Start"/>my<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12257__End"/>
the pain I felt. Clerval, whose
<lb n="c56-0067__main__15"/>
eyes and feelings were always quick
<lb n="c56-0067__main__16"/>
in discerning the sensations of
others <lb n="c56-0067__main__17"/>
declined the
subject alledging <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his<lb n="c56-0067__main__18"/> ignorance
& the conversation took
<lb n="c56-0067__main__19"/>
a more general turn. I thanked
him <lb n="c56-0067__main__20"/>
from my heart, but I did not speak.
<lb n="c56-0067__main__21"/>
I
plainly
saw
that he was surprised,
<lb n="c56-0067__main__22"/>
but he never attempted to draw
<lb n="c56-0067__main__23"/>
my secret from
me,
and although
<lb n="c56-0067__main__24"/>
I loved him with a mixture of
<lb n="c56-0067__main__25"/><del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12298__Start"/>love<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12298__End"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/>affection
and reverence that knew
no
<lb n="c56-0067__main__26"/>
bounds,
yet I could never
<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12312__Start"/>pr<del loc="c56-0067__main__d1e12312__End"/>
persuade
<lb n="c56-0067__main__27"/>
myself to confide to him that event
<lb n="c56-0067__main__28"/>
which was so often present to my
<lb n="c56-0067__main__29"/> thoughts,
but which I feared the detail
<lb n="c56-0067__main__30"/>
to another would only impress more
deeply.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__1"/> Mr.
Krempe was not
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>equally docile <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12345__Start"/>yet<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12345__End"/>&weak <lb n="c56-0068__main__2"/> as my illness had made me<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__1"/>
in my
then <lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__2"/> condition
of
<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__3"/>
almost in<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__4"/>supportable<lb n="c56-0068__left_margin__5"/>
sensitiveness
his harsh
<lb n="c56-0068__main__3"/>
blunt
econiums
gave me even more
<lb n="c56-0068__main__4"/>
pain
<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12383__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12383__End"/>
than the benevolent
<lb n="c56-0068__main__5"/>
approbation of M.
Waldman —"Damn<lb n="c56-0068__main__6"/> "the fellow,"
cried
he "Why Mr. Clerval <lb n="c56-0068__main__7"/> "I tell
you he has
<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12402__Start"/>beaut<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12402__End"/>
outstript
<lb n="c56-0068__main__8"/> "us all– ay
stare if you
please
but
<lb n="c56-0068__main__9"/> "it
is
nevertheless
true –
A youngster
<lb n="c56-0068__main__10"/> "who
but
<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12411__Start"/>two<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12411__End"/> three
years
ago
believed
<lb n="c56-0068__main__11"/> "Cornelius
Agrippa
<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12419__Start"/>to be<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12419__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as
firmly as
the
gospel
has
<lb n="c56-0068__main__12"/> "now
set himself at the head of
<lb n="c56-0068__main__13"/> "the university
& if he is not soon
<lb n="c56-0068__main__14"/> "pulled down
we shall all be out
<lb n="c56-0068__main__15"/> "of
countenance.—Aye,
Aye,
continued
<lb n="c56-0068__main__16"/> "he
observing my
<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12443__Start"/>countenance<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12443__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>faceex<lb n="c56-0068__main__17"/>pressive
of
suffering "Mr. <del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12460__Start"/>f<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12460__End"/>Franken<lb n="c56-0068__main__18"/>stein
is
modest
an excellent quality in
<lb n="c56-0068__main__19"/> "a
young
man;
Young men should be
<lb n="c56-0068__main__20"/> "diffident
of
themselves
you
know Mr<lb n="c56-0068__main__21"/> "Clerval;
I was myself when
young
but
<lb n="c56-0068__main__22"/> "one soon grows out of that."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__23"/> Mr
Krempe had now commenced
<lb n="c56-0068__main__24"/><del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12495__Start"/>the subject of his own praise<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12495__End"/>an
eulogy on
himself and that <lb n="c56-0068__main__25"/>
happily turned the conversation
<lb n="c56-0068__main__26"/>
from
the
subject that was so
<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12508__Start"/>painful<del loc="c56-0068__main__d1e12508__End"/>agonizing<lb n="c56-0068__main__27"/>
to
me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0068__main__28"/> Clerval
was no
natural
philosopher.
<lb n="c56-0068__main__29"/>
His
imagination was too vivid for<lb n="c56-0069__main__1"/>
the
minutiæ
of science.
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12531__Start"/>La<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12531__End"/>Lan<lb n="c56-0069__main__2"/>guages
were his
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12543__Start"/>chief<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12543__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>principal study for
he
<lb n="c56-0069__main__3"/> wished
to
open a field
for
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12558__Start"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>him<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12558__End"/>self-instruc<lb n="c56-0069__main__4"/>tion
on
his
return
– <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12573__Start"/>Greek<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12573__End"/> Persian <lb n="c56-0069__main__5"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12577__Start"/>&<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12577__End"/> Arabic
&
Hebrew
gained
his
atten<lb n="c56-0069__main__6"/>tion<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12589__Start"/>when<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12589__End"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0069.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>so soon as <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark>
he had
become
perfect<lb n="c56-0069__main__7"/>ly master of
the
Greek &
Latin langua<lb n="c56-0069__main__8"/>ges.
For my own
part
idleness had
<lb n="c56-0069__main__9"/>
ever been irksome to
me
and
<lb n="c56-0069__main__10"/>
now that I
wished to
fly from
reflec<lb n="c56-0069__main__11"/>tion
and hated my former
studies <lb n="c56-0069__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12629__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12629__End"/>
I
found
great relief in being the
<lb n="c56-0069__main__13"/> fellow pupil
with my
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12641__Start"/>fr<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12641__End"/> friend
and
<lb n="c56-0069__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12645__Start"/>I
not
a
only<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12645__End"/>
found <del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12651__Start"/>instruct<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12651__End"/>not onlyinstruc<lb n="c56-0069__main__15"/>tion
but consolation in the works of
<lb n="c56-0069__main__16"/>
the orientalists.
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12666__Start"/>There is something soothing<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12666__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__main__17"/>
Their melancholy is
soothing
and their
<lb n="c56-0069__main__18"/>
joy
elevating
to a degree I never
before <lb n="c56-0069__main__19"/>
experienced in
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12678__Start"/>reading<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12678__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>studying<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12691__Start"/>any<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12691__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the
authors
ofany
other
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12707__Start"/>books.<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12707__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>country.<lb n="c56-0069__main__20"/>
When you
read<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12721__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12721__End"/>
their
<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12724__Start"/>li<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12724__End"/> writings
life
<lb n="c56-0069__main__21"/>
appears to consist in a warm sun
<lb n="c56-0069__main__22"/>
and
gardens
of
roses – in
the smiles
&<lb n="c56-0069__main__23"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12736__Start"/>tears<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12736__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>frowns
of a fair
enemy
and the fire
<lb n="c56-0069__main__24"/>
that consumes your own
heart <lb n="c56-0069__main__25"/>
How different from the
man<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ly &<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12761__Start"/>warlike<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12761__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__main__26"/><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>heroical
poetry of Greece &
Rome.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0069__main__27"/> Summer
passed away in these
<lb n="c56-0069__main__28"/><del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12786__Start"/>studies<del loc="c56-0069__main__d1e12786__End"/><lb n="c56-0069__left_margin__1"/>occupations&
my return to Geneva was
<lb n="c56-0069__main__29"/>
fixed for the latter end of
Autumn
but<lb n="c56-0070__main__1"/> being delayed by several
accidents
winter <lb n="c56-0070__main__2"/>& snow arrived,
<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12816__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12816__End"/>
the roads were
<lb n="c56-0070__main__3"/>
deemed
impassable
and my
<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12823__Start"/>return<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12823__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>journey<lb n="c56-0070__main__4"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12838__Start"/>delayed<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12838__End"/><lb n="c56-0070__left_margin__1"/>
was
<lb n="c56-0070__left_margin__2"/> retarted untill
the
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ensuing
spring. I felt this
<lb n="c56-0070__main__5"/>
delay very
bitterly <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for
I longed to see my
<lb n="c56-0070__main__6"/>
native
town
and my beloved
friends <lb n="c56-0070__main__7"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12884__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12884__End"/>
my return had only been delayed
<lb n="c56-0070__main__8"/>
so
long
from an unwillingness to leave
<lb n="c56-0070__main__9"/>
Clerval in a strange
town
before he
<lb n="c56-0070__main__10"/>
had become acquainted with
its in<lb n="c56-0070__main__11"/>habitants. The
winter <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>however
was
<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12912__Start"/>however<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12912__End"/> spent<lb n="c56-0070__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12921__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12921__End"/> cheerfully<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12927__Start"/>one<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12927__End"/>
and although the
<lb n="c56-0070__main__13"/>
spring was uncommonly
late
when
<lb n="c56-0070__main__14"/>
it
came
its beauty compensated <lb n="c56-0070__main__15"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12936__Start"/>for<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12936__End"/> its
dilatoriness. <del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12939__Start"/>Ma<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12939__End"/> The
month
<lb n="c56-0070__main__16"/>
of May
was
already
<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12944__Start"/>finis<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12944__End"/><del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12947__Start"/>end<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12947__End"/>com<lb n="c56-0070__main__17"/>pleated,
and I expected
daily
the
<lb n="c56-0070__main__18"/>
letter
that
was to fix the date of
<lb n="c56-0070__main__19"/>
my
<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12963__Start"/>return<del loc="c56-0070__main__d1e12963__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>departure,
When Henry proposed
<lb n="c56-0070__main__20"/>
a pedestrian tour in
environs of
<lb n="c56-0070__main__21"/>
Ingolstadt
that I might bid
farewell
<lb n="c56-0070__main__22"/>
to the country I had so long
in<lb n="c56-0070__main__23"/>habited.–
I
acceeded
with pleasure to
<lb n="c56-0070__main__24"/>
this
propos<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ition–
I was fond of
Exercise <lb n="c56-0070__main__25"/>
and Clerval had always been my
<lb n="c56-0070__main__26"/>
favourite companion in
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the
rambles
<lb n="c56-0070__main__27"/>
of this nature that I had taken
<lb n="c56-0070__main__28"/>
among the scenes of my native
coun<lb n="c56-0071__main__1"/> try. We
passed a fortnight in these
<lb n="c56-0071__main__2"/> perambulations.
My health and spirits had long
<lb n="c56-0071__main__3"/>
been
restored
and they gained additional
vigour <lb n="c56-0071__main__4"/>
from the salubrious
air<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13038__Start"/>,<metamark>X</metamark><del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13038__End"/>
I breathed,
<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0071.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__1"/>
the natural
<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__2"/>
incidents of
<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__3"/>
our
progress<metamark>X</metamark>
and the
<lb n="c56-0071__main__5"/>
conversation of my friend. Study had before
<lb n="c56-0071__main__6"/> rendered
me
unsocia<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13069__Start"/>ble<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13069__End"/>l, –Ihad shunned
the
<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13080__Start"/>face<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13080__End"/><lb n="c56-0071__main__7"/> company
of my
fellow beings
But Clerval
<lb n="c56-0071__main__8"/>
called forth the better feelings of my
heart. <lb n="c56-0071__main__9"/>
he again taught me to love the aspect
<lb n="c56-0071__main__10"/>
of
nature
and the cheerful faces of chil<lb n="c56-0071__main__11"/>dren. Excellent Friend! How sincerely did you
<lb n="c56-0071__main__12"/>
love
me
and endeavour to elevate my
<lb n="c56-0071__main__13"/>
mind
untill
it was on a level with
<lb n="c56-0071__main__14"/>
your
own.
A selfish
persuit<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13104__Start"/>e<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13104__End"/>
had cramp<lb n="c56-0071__main__15"/>ed and narrowed
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me untill
your
gentle <lb n="c56-0071__main__16"/> ness
& affection warmed & opened
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my senses. and <lb n="c56-0071__main__17"/> now
I
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13149__Start"/>now<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13149__End"/>
became the same happy creature
<lb n="c56-0071__main__18"/> who
a few years ago,
loving
& beloved by
<lb n="c56-0071__main__19"/>
all, had no sorrow or
care – <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13159__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13159__End"/><del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13162__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13162__End"/>
when
<lb n="c56-0071__main__20"/> happy soul was more fitted than mine <lb n="c56-0071__main__21"/> for feeling delight<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13177__Start"/>in<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13177__End"/>
inanimate nature
<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0071.05">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark>had
the
<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__2"/>
power of
bes<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__3"/><del loc="c56-0071__left_margin__d1e13195__Start"/>bo<del loc="c56-0071__left_margin__d1e13195__End"/>towing
on
<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__4"/>
me the most
<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__5"/>
delightful
<lb n="c56-0071__left_margin__6"/> sensations — <lb n="c56-0071__main__22"/>
A serene sky
<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13211__Start"/>filled<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13211__End"/>
and
verdant<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13214__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13214__End"/>
fields
<lb n="c56-0071__main__23"/>
filled me with
extasy.–The <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>present
season was indeed
<lb n="c56-0071__main__24"/> divine –
the flowers of spring
<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13240__Start"/>blossomed<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13240__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>bloomed
in the
<lb n="c56-0071__main__25"/> hedges
while those of summer were al<lb n="c56-0071__main__26"/>ready in
bud–
I
<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13260__Start"/>dis<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13260__End"/>
was
not disturbed
by
<lb n="c56-0071__main__27"/>
thoughts
that
during the
preceeding <lb n="c56-0071__main__28"/>
year
pressed upon
me not withstand<lb n="c56-0071__main__29"/>ing
my endeavours to throw them
offwith
an invincible
burthen.<lb n="c56-0071__main__30"/> Henry <del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13279__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13279__End"/>
rejoiced
<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13283__Start"/>im<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13283__End"/>
in my
gaiety
and
<lb n="c56-0071__main__31"/>
sincerely
sympathized
in my
<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13290__Start"/>joy<del loc="c56-0071__main__d1e13290__End"/>feelings –
he exer<lb n="c56-0072__main__1"/>ted himself to amuse me, while he expressed
<lb n="c56-0072__main__2"/>
the
feelings
that
<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13311__Start"/>al<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13311__End"/>
filled his
<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13316__Start"/>mind<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13316__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>soul.
The
<lb n="c56-0072__main__3"/>
resources of his mind on this occasion
<lb n="c56-0072__main__4"/>
were truly
astonishing. As we rested during <lb n="c56-0072__main__5"/> the sultry heat of noon he invented<lb n="c56-0072__main__6"/>
his conversation was full of
imagination <lb n="c56-0072__main__7"/>
and very often, in imitation of the
persi<lb n="c56-0072__main__8"/>an&
Arabic writers, he invented tales
<lb n="c56-0072__main__9"/>
of
<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13353__Start"/>great<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13353__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>wonderful
fancy and
interrest.
At other
<lb n="c56-0072__main__10"/>
times he repeated my favourite
poems <lb n="c56-0072__main__11"/>
or drew me out into
arguments
which
<lb n="c56-0072__main__12"/>
he supported with great
ingenuity.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0072__main__13"/> We
returned
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
our
colledge
on a sunday
–
the
pea <lb n="c56-0072__main__14"/> sants
were
dancing
and every one we
<lb n="c56-0072__main__15"/>
met appeared
joyful
and
happy –
my
<lb n="c56-0072__main__16"/>
own spirits were
high
and I bounded
<lb n="c56-0072__main__17"/>
along with
<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13394__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13394__End"/>
feelings of
<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13397__Start"/>hilarity<del loc="c56-0072__main__d1e13397__End"/>unbound <lb n="c56-0072__main__18"/> ed<lb n="c56-0072__left_margin__1"/>unbridled
joy and hilarity.
<lb n="c56-0072__main__19"/><metamark function="count">20</metamark><lb n="c56-0072__main__20"/><metamark function="count">15</metamark>
